metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13718 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Insufficient data validation in Omnibox in Google Chrome prior to78.0.3904.70 allowed a remote attacker to perform domain spoofing via IDNhomographs via a crafted domain name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13718` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 78.0.3904.70-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
chromium-browser-l10n - 78.0.3904.70-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
chromium-chromedriver - 78.0.3904.70-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 78.0.3904.70-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 78.0.3904.70-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '78.0.3904.70-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
